channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The bin is still over flowing has not been emptied, 21st January
item.description:
The bin is still over flowing the rubbish and dog waste cover the pavement causing health and safety issue. if your not going to service the bin please take it away

item.title: URGENT and DANGEROUS highway defect, 21st January
item.description:
Dear Sir / Madam, I am writing to report an URGENT and DANGEROUS highway defect. There is a blocked gully on a roundabout which is causing significant water build-up across the carriageway. The standing water is extensive and presents a serious and immediate risk to road users, particularly vehicles losing control when entering or exiting the roundabout. Given the location and traffic movements, this condition could result in a serious or fatal accident if not addressed immediately. Location: [Insert roundabout name, road name(s), town, and any nearby landmarks] Issue: Blocked gully resulting in severe surface water accumulation across live traffic lanes. Risk: High – immediate danger to vehicles, motorcyclists, cyclists, and pedestrians. Please confirm urgent attendance and remedial action as soon as possible. If this matter is not addressed promptly, I will have no option but to escalate due to the clear and present danger.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): South Eden Park Road, Eden Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish, 21st January
item.description:

item.title: Vehicle parked on the street blocking lane, 21st January
item.description:
